abstract.t: This document specifies a method based on Cryptographically Generated Addresses (CGA) for protecting the IPv6 network from address spoofing. The basic idea is to define a new IPv6 extension header which is called CGA header. Three new options of CGA header are introduced to satisfy the need of verification between all CGA-aware nodes. This document also illustrates the proposed verification procedure under several different situations. Additionally, a possible alternative way using destination options header to take CGA information is described.
